welcome_benefits: Choose a gift voucher worth Rs. 12,500 from any one of Luxe, Yatra, or Postcard Hotels

Movie & Dining: 15% Discount at 4,000+ Restaurants Across India Under the Axis Dining Delights Program
Rewards Rate: 12 Axis EDGE REWARDS Points for every Rs. 200 spent with the card, 5X EDGE REWARDS on travel spends via TRAVEL EDGE.
Reward Redemption: Axis EDGE REWARDS Points can be redeemed on the EDGE REWARDS portal at a value of 1 Edge Reward = Re. 0.20 or Transfer to Partner Airlines/Hotels Rewards Program.
Travel: 4 Free International Airport Lounge Visits for Guests Each Year
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited Free Domestic Airport Lounge Access for Primary and Add-On Cardholders on Spends of ₹50,000 or More in the Previous Quarter
International Lounge Access: Unlimited Complimentary International Airport Lounge Access Via Priority Pass
Insurance Benefits: Credit shield protection worth Rs. 5 lakh (in case the card is lost) and a purchase protection worth Rs. 2 lakh.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹25 Lakh
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived off at all fuel stations across India

product_details: ₹12,500 worth of gift vouchers from Luxe, Postcard Hotels, or Yatra as a welcome benefit
12 Axis EDGE REWARDS Points for every ₹200 spent on retail purchases up to ₹1.5 Lakhs. Earn 35 RPs per ₹200 after exceeding the monthly spend of ₹1.5 Lakhs
Earn 60 Axis EDGE REWARDS Points for every ₹200 spent on the Travel Edge portal up to ₹2 Lakhs. Earn 35 RPs per ₹200 after exceeding the monthly spend of ₹2 Lakhs
Unlimited domestic airport lounge access every year.
Unlimited complimentary international lounge visits every year with Priority Pass.
15% discount up to Rs 1,000 via Eazydiner at 4,000+ restaurants across India under the Axis Bank Dining Delights program.
Credit Shield cover (against misuse of the card) worth ₹5 lakh and purchase protection worth ₹2 lakh with Axis Bank Magnus Card.
Lower interest rate (3% per month), foreign currency markup (2%), and zero cash withdrawal fee.
